==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Tianyi:''' Hello there, Traveler!
:{{DIcon}} Why, hello.
::'''Tianyi:''' If you're here on important business, please look for our director, [[Muning]]. But if you don't have any key purpose here, please leave [[The Chasm]].
::'''Tianyi:''' I apologize for being brusque, but I really haven't the time for too much idle chit-chat.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Tianyi:''' See you. Please take care!
{{Dialogue end}}
